ai-patthana21.27:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana21.27:1.1_0: Not seeing the cause or condition for the sake of purification of thought.
ai-patthana21.27:1.1_1: Not knowing the cause or condition for the sake of purification of natural principles.
ai-patthana21.27:2.1_0: Not seeing the expansive principle as a principle.
ai-patthana21.27:3.1_0: Not knowing and seeing the cause or condition for the reason.
